website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large and beautifully flexible cold pack that offers extensive coverage. Ideal for thighs, neck, shoulders, hips, or total back coverage.
pros: Gel filling remains flexible when frozen and molds to contours
Freezes quickly and stays cold for hours at a time
Robust nylon cover and double reinforced stitching prevents wetness and leaks
cons: No straps to hold it in place
A handful of users felt it could stay cold for longer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking!!
customer_reviews.text: I receive my cold pack yesterday, put it in the freezer and attempted to use it. Unfortunately I found that it was leaking. I never noticed on the website that this is a non-returnable item. Be careful when ordering. Bad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RoxyGr52884

customer_reviews.title: Ice pac + knee brace = relief
customer_reviews.text: Great product gets nice and cool I order 2 half sizes for both my knees and what i do is i use a knee brace, i also bought on amazon, to strap it down. The knee brace is: "Knee Brace Support For Arthritis, ACL, Running, Basketball, Meniscus Tear, Sports, Athletic. Open Patella Protector Wrap, Neoprene, Non-Bulky, Relieves Pain,, Best Braces by Winzone" Check the pics!
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after ~6 months, but amazing support.
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of these and wrap them (with Ace bandage) on my knees (after basketball) 3-4 times per week. Unfortunately, I've had two cold pack start leaking after ~6 months of use Pros - Smooth fabric - Stays cold - Excellent support (from Natracure) Cons - Two are leaking and suspect the others will start to leak too (see picture) I love the product (and the company), but leaking gel is a deal breaker for me. It is not only a nuisance, but it gets all over the ace bandages I use and gets messy. What do you think?
customer_reviews.author: Researcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 5⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I got in a bad car accident almost 10 years ago & my back pain progresses every day. I have fibromyalgia, a chronic pain issue, so everyday can be a struggle with the easiest tasks. 🔅This cold pack is great. It stays cold for HOURS 🔅I’m able to put it behind me when I lay on the chair or couch and it’s sturdy enough it won’t pop 🔅I keep it folded in my freezer, so it doesn’t take up too much room, and I’ve never experienced the gel unable to go in some areas. Im also able to smoosh the gel around I’m very thankful I found this & Glad I bought it(with help from all the positive reviews!)
customer_reviews.author: Em🐾

customer_reviews.title: Turn it into a compression pack!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had ankle surgery and this has been incredible. I ordered the large so I could use it for all body parts. The large wraps fully around my foot & ankle. I wrap the ice pack in an ace bandage and it becomes a compression ice pack. This gel pack gets cold quickly and stays cold. I often sleep with it on. If you’re looking to recover quickly from surgery buy this as well as the Milliard foam leg elevator. Both have helped loads! I tried the cheaper option of a pillow stack coupled with an ice bag and these are DEFINITELY worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Mine froze solid. The reason I bought it was for my knee. I wanted it to bend on my knee it said it would stay flexible totally false.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for ALL your woes!
customer_reviews.text: I just had shoulder surgery and between multiple back surgeries that have bugged my neck for years and now needing the cold/hot for shoulder rehab, this is the best! Be forewarned - it will FREEZE whatever body part you lay it on for about 10 minutes - steam and all. But it hurts so good! Covers any area you want and cools just right so after 15 minutes it's a wonderful feeling of cool on the affected region. Need to make room in your freezer, but calling all athletes and us older folks with achy bones (and surgeries) - this is killer.
customer_reviews.author: Norman C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Item not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't sit on your neck in a way that lets the cold get to your skin, and Amazon won't let me return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C Vanderloo

customer_reviews.title: Cold pack that doesn't have internal support or nonuniform insulation
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold for what feels like 10-15min. Never timed it. But it is annoying to try and keep on my neck, keeps sliding off. It also accumulates a lot of condensation on the exposed side. It would have been nice if it had a sleeve or insulation material on one side so that it wouldn't waste to much cooling on the exposed surface. The internal doesn't seem to have any cell structure so the jell can clump up at times and you need to force it uniformly distribute again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After activity, barely get 10 minutes of deep cold
customer_reviews.text: If you just got done with a run or activity raising your heart rate and body temperature, this is not a good substitute for an ice pack. I don't doubt it stays cold for as long as some people say, but certainly not the case on my knee after I play basketball or go for a run. Going to try another and will update if I find one that stays cold for a solid 15 minutes like an ice pack
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, worth spending a little more for these
customer_reviews.text: My husband just had double knee-replacement surgery and the small ACE cold packs hardly felt cold after 5 minutes and perspired, they were always wet after using them so they got frosty when I put them back in the freezer. I decided to order these rather than spending a ton for a Polar Care or Ice Man cooler and they have worked great. They are well-made with sewn edges that seem sturdy to keep it together, and they are quite heavy. This is very helpful for my husband as he needs to keep his legs straight and elevated. The weight and cold help him do that. He's very glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Haugen

customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a box (product box, not an Amazon one). I was worried it was going to come in a plastic bag and arrive with leaks / damage. It's eaily shaped and covers both of my knees simultaneously, but doesn't hold the cold for very long. That said, if there was more material in it (and able to stay cold for longer), it wouldn't be as easily moldable onto joints etc, so it's a give and take.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Best Cold Pack I Have Bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have arthritis in the knees and have a damaged nerve in my back. I have had problems finding something that would get cold enough to provide relief and not have ice cubes poking me in the back when I sit in a chair. The FlexiKold gets real cold and stays cold for a while. I had bought one to try and fell in love with it and bought a second one. They refreeze in just a couple of hours and don't take up much room in the freezer. I use these on my knees twice a day and they provide great relief. Again this is just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican25

customer_reviews.title: Great! I love it! 20 minutes to chill
customer_reviews.text: The FlexiKold Gel Pack is just what I expected. I love the oversize because I can wrap it around my foot or ankle; it also covers my entire lower back. The pack isn't overly filled with fluid which is also nice when trying to work with it. If it was too full it would be difficult to wrap it around my foot or ankle. It only takes about 20 minutes in the freezer to be ready for another round of use. This is great for 20 minutes on, 20 minutes off therapy! I fold it over and leave it in my freezer when not in use so it is always ready when needed. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie gma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Purchase. Superb Quality. These gel packs are the best I've ever used. I'm rehabbing a knee and these cold packs stay colder longer and are a deeper cold than just ice or peas. And they get cold quicker. They aren't going to fall apart like my other cold pack. These are sewn together not glued. The glued ones just breakdown and then leak and make a huge mess. I bet these cold packs will last years and years.
customer_reviews.author: BigDogChloe

customer_reviews.title: Quality built, but not ideal for wrapping injury.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for specific use. I purchased in hope this would be pliable enough to wrap around a knee that was surgically repaired, however, it seems due to the high quality of the fabric used it’s difficult to manipulate on non flat surfaces. Would be great for flat use such as back but not the best for knees, elbows, etc.
customer_reviews.author: eboat

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief!
customer_reviews.text: That's what I love about Amazon Prime - when you find something you want or need, it's almost immediate gratification. I had been using a smaller size of gel packs, because my old larger one had worn out & gotten hard. It was time to update, since my back had gotten worse and the smaller size just didn't cover all my troublesome areas. This one was the perfect solution! It covers a large area and is soft and pliable when using, even tho almost frozen. I can use it on many different areas, sitting or lying down. I'm happy to report that I am feeling so much better now!
customer_reviews.author: Judie Cook

customer_reviews.title: Better than some, not as good as others
customer_reviews.text: This item is said that it’s a “cold” pack, so unsure why the review question asks about its “warmth”. I do know that these types of ice packs can be used as both ice pack and warmth, but to ask one to review for warmth and not include cooling seems odd to me. I’ve been using ice packs due to medical conditions for Years and this one though better than some, doesn’t last as long as the ones previously purchased. I will go back to the ones I purchased in the past. Though they look similar, something is different in their ability to hold the coolness factor longer,
customer_reviews.author: Dee Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for small areas !
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery years ago but from time to time still have pain and these small ice packs work like a charm for the 20 minutes I use them. Glad there come as a double pack so you can use one and have another ready if you need it. They don’t take long to refreeze either is another reason I like this particular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place, stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for ankle. It's better than the one my PT uses. I purchased 4 other types before this one and it was annoying that they didn't really wrap around my ankle or if they did the strap had to be really tight. This has a nice weight to it and I can almost wrap it around to overlap and use my heel to keep it in place. If you are recovering from a bad ankle break you will need to ice your foot a lot in recovery phase. This is a great ice pack!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Versatile ice pack but only stays cold for 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2 pack of this ice pack to use on different parts of my body. I left it overnight in my freezer then applied 1 of the packs around my ankle. It conforms really well and is comfortable against different joints. However, I timed how cold it remained and it only lasted 20 minutes. Here is the caveat to that statement. The side that is in contact with your skin lasts 20 minutes. If you change sides then the other side is still slightly cool for another 10-15 minutes. I’ll be returning the item as I only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: liftacar

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Good Company
customer_reviews.text: This gel pack is perfect for wherever you need cold. It's flexible enough to be wrapped around a joint and big enough to take care of your back. It doesn't hold cold more than 20 minutes so just get two if you need cold longer. It only requires a couple of hours in the freezer to be ready to go again. The company impressed me with their quick response to my questions and were most helpful in resolving my problem. I recommend Natracure!
customer_reviews.author: cjb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ice pack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice pack! I bought it after using a small one for my back and decided I needed to break out the big guns. After reading reviews I was a little skeptical. But, overall, am very happy with it. It freezes quickly, maintains flexibility, and is amazingly cold. It does form some condensation after being in the freezer and thawing out, but nothing placing it in a pillow case won’t fix. It stays cold for about 45 minutes. When it gets too cold for me, I’ll share it with my pooch since we’re in the middle of a heat wave and she approves of it as well. I will definitely purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Super ice pack that everyone should have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ice pad which I needed for a knee injury. It wraps about 65% around your leg for total icing, unlike the smaller and cheaper ice packs. I used one similar at my physical therapy and decided to try this one. It is actually nicer that at the therapist, in my opinion. Very pliable and freezes back up very quickly, normally within an hour or two. DO yourself a favor and get one of these even if you don't need one at the moment because eventually, you will.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: sucks !!
customer_reviews.text: 1st. Did realize I ordered 2 of them..(my bust) 2nd The item is to short for my neck area.. and it fall off.. disappointed 3. No return !!!!!!! Why not????? Can’t use them.. perfectly brand new!!! I didn’t see where, this was mention until I pushed the button to be able to return... that sucks!!!! Thanks for nothing!! ab 4/23/2020
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great for 5 minutes...then my wife confiscated it...
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the refrigerator when I had a headache and put it on. Felt good for only 5 minutes until my wife convinced me her headache was worse and "stole" it from me. Looks like I well have to get another one for I do not believe she is going to let me know where she hid it...lol Good product and does work as stated.....according to my wife. It did feel good on me of the few minutes I used it. Oh well as they say.... "Happy Wife...Happy Life!" Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rad5030

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but may be limited by how heavy it is
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and help my wife who has been having issues with neck soreness, while it seems to help some she says it is too heavy which can cause some discomfort. I have found it to be useful for laying on if you have a sore lower back, so expect to get some good use out of it that way, or just as a general sort of cold pad. Since my wife is on the smaller side this might be the reason that it feels too heavy for her, so keep that in mind if the person this is being purchased for is smaller themselves.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a really well made ice pack. once it’s frozen It lasts a couple hours easily before having to put back in the freezer. the fabric is soft and durable so it’s comfortable to the skin and easy to manipulate. I use this primarily on my shoulders and neck but i’ve also used It for lumbar, leg, and even wrapped It around my forearm and wrists. i’ve used It weekly for a couple months and It hasnt lost shape or stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Shape But Don't Stay Frozen Very Long
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these as the price seemed pretty good. When they arrived I was pleasantly surprised how big they were. However after a 1/2 day in the freezer and applying one to my shoulder, it quickly warmed to the point that it would no longer cool within 30 minutes or so. Kind of surprised as my other cooling pads last as much as 2 hours. However for the price I suppose they're a good investment if all you need is a few short minutes of cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinroller

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This pad is so much better than using frozen peas, cooler ice packs, or the cheap small packs you can pick up at the local drug store. Bought this to use on my back, shoulder, neck, and ankle. It's not TOO cold but yet still cold. It doesn't require a cloth or any other barrier between your skin and the pad, and it stays cold for about 20 minutes of continuous use - which is perfect since you shouldn't be subjecting your skin to an ice pack for longer than 15-20 minute intervals. No leaks, folds and freezes nicely, nothing bad to say. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Freebird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this every day multiple times per day since receiving it, and I am very pleased! It stays cold long enough to ice 15 min on, 15 min off, and I variate between my neck and shoulders, and my mid-lower back. The gel it’s filled with conforms to my body and feels like an ice pillow. Super comfortable, appears to be very durable, and it freezes quickly. I flip it over between continuous uses as I’ve found it makes it last twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great ice pack but it’s sweats/is wet as you use it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cold which is awesome but it’s also very wet. The ice pack sweats significantly during the 20 minutes of use which will saturate your cotton clothes/sheet or barrier your using If you are dealing w a incision or surgical wound which is not to be wet or even damp this can be a very serious issue
customer_reviews.author: spring

customer_reviews.title: Best Cold Pack EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST cold pack I've ever purchased. I have frequent back pain and neck issues. I wanted to try the smaller one first since my neck is what is acting up now and the regular size may be a little too large. It is shapeable when it comes out of the freezer without being too runny to stay in place. The outer material is very sturdy and well constructed. The only potential improvement would be to have some kind of wrap cover to keep the direct cold off skin, but I'm able to use what I already have for that, so no stars deducted. I will definitely be buying the other sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Frosty and fulfilling!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly happy with this ice pack as it does the job and stays cold for as long as I need it to during therapy. No leaks have been experienced so far, and it gets ice cold quickly in the freezer. Size is great for a medium to large back and can cover anywhere from a third to half of it. I don't advise using a thick towel between your skin and the pack as I noticed the cooling effect is significantly reduced that way. I found it was effective enough just to use your shirt as a barrier, though of course adhere to any advice given to you by your medical professional (if applicable).
customer_reviews.author: Drachen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely exceptional customer service from Natracure!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought two of the standard ice packs without straps, and I really needed the straps for the way I intended to use them. Sadly I found out that according to (faceless) amazon fulfillment I can't exchange them. I'm screwed.....right? NO!!! NATRACURE to the rescue!!! Amazon fulfillment left me in a lurch, but after contacting Natracure directly I spoke with Shannon (who returned my call immediately) and sent me out the straps. Wow! Heroics from a small company! Way to go Natracure!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sharky

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing, does not stay cold
customer_reviews.text: I totally wish I had read the reviews first, rather than just gone by the rating. The pack stays cold for *maybe* 10 minutes and then I need to replace it. In rereading the description, where is the return policy stating it doesn’t take the product back? I’m recovering from major orthopedic surgery and bought two of the XL ice packs, using one at a time. This is such a waste of money, unhelpful, tedious, and disappointing whe I should be resting and healing.
customer_reviews.author: Kacats

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This ice pack absolutely molds to the part needing to be iced. I can’t even articulate how much I love this pack. I needed to replace a different brand one which was smaller but thicker and it sprung an icky gooey gel mess. I like to keep more than one pack in my freezer because, I am klutzy and also have injuries that predict the weather in angry inflamed ways. This pack is perfect. And I finally found one that is big and constructed for years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Can't attach velcro straps...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to be a backup and extra pack for the FlexiKold Gel Ice Pack w/Straps because it was listed under the "Frequently Bought Together" heading, but this pack is smooth plastic or latex all around with no fabric side with which to attach the Velcro straps. It's a nice-looking pack and seems to be well-made, but I'll have to find a different use for it than an after knee surgery system.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Syndergaard

customer_reviews.title: The best ice pack I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best ice pack I've ever had. The material is very strong, but more than that the material it is made out of on the outside seems to conduct the cold very well and even help the cold last longer when compared to normal soft ice pack material. Kind of like it is so dense/robust that the sheath material itself keeps cold very well in and of itself (of course not as well as the stuff inside). I like this pack because it is just the right temperature to not give me frost bite when applied directly to skin. Stays nice and cold long enough for a long ice session even when directly against my back/knee/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Beller

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Gel Pack I've Bought
customer_reviews.text: I just bought two more after having one for a couple years. Here's what you need to know: These a high quality and durable, the one I have has outlasted other brands which eventually wear and burst open. They get much colder than other gel packs I've used, while remaining flexible, and they stay colder for longer. This is great if you need to 'deep' ice a tension or muscle, but make sure it's not directly on your skin. A thin pillow case works great for me. My physical therapist suggest a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: don't-panic-42

customer_reviews.title: FlexiKold Ice Pack (Standard Large 10.5" x 14.5")
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems like an excellent ice pack. Stays cold for a very long time. Extremely flexible even when ice cold. The coldness and length of time in freezer determines So far it seems like an excellent ice pack. Extremely flexible even when ice cold. The colder the freezer the longer it stays cold. Mine stays cold for about an hour but room temperature and other factors will cause that to vary.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Balint

customer_reviews.title: Best coldpak I've bought in a long while
customer_reviews.text: Best coldpak I've bought in a long while. Always had those blue ones that the seam leak goop like crazy. This baby is made so well it would take a nail to put a hole in it. Stays cold longer and the outer coating is thick. It's a big one, which I wanted and works great for backs and is bendable for necks. You will not be sorry if you buy this. Wish I had discovered this baby yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Really An XL Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This cold pack was fabulous for my husband’s knee replacement aftercare! No other “knee” pack measured big enough around to ice a swollen knee joint. We just used this with a towel ( either inside towel folded over it, or over a towel folded lengthwise) to keep his knee well-iced after surgery and through therapy. His PT was very satisfied with it as well. This also freezes up pretty quickly but can also be “rolled” around the knee etc. We bought 2 so we could be sure to have a cold pad at all times, especially 2 weeks after surgery.
customer_reviews.author: PatsyM

customer_reviews.title: Great size, what a relief!
customer_reviews.text: Recently my son’s Great Dane ran into me and I fell on my rear end. I tried a ziplock bag with ice but it leaked. My doctor had me go to a physical therapist who recommended a extra large gel pack and I ordered this one. This ice pack was such a relief. It covered my entire back and stayed cold for hours. One of my closest friends had a hip replacement and I ordered one for her and she loves hers. So glad I got mine and hers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Qua;ity Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months, use them almost daily to ice my back. The cover is not like anything I've purchased in the store(flimsy fabrics), it is sturdy, quality. The filling is firm, but moldable. My only issue is it starts to warm up after a half hour or so.....more quickly than the gel packs I've used. But, I will purchase more of these and skip the gel packs altogether for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Clarasbel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for my neck pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 surgeries on my neck, last one had plate and screws placed in to try and support and straighten my cervical area...Still have awful pains and especially after a couple of falls and a whiplash. This Cold pack is just right for fitting and wrapping around my neck and down across my shoulders. Use it all the time...keep it in my freezer and it's ready whenever I need it. Fabulous product...Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I'm using a cold pack a lot lately and bought a second Equate brand but found it to be much stiffer than an older one that is just remarkable. Hoping this one would be as comfortable as the old one I purchased it based on the advertising saying it was the softest available. Right out of the gate, and being new now, it doesn't stand up to the advertising claim, it's as stiff as the new Equate I was hoping to replace. In time it may soften up. It is well made and look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I am an aging athlete. These are good for 3/4 of a knee (not large enough to wrap all the way around) or a full ankle or foot (size 11). Agree with the other reviewers that the surface of these are nice - don't feel like rubber but more a fine weave, pliable nylon. Prefer these to other brands I've had. I just keep a pair in the freezer and wrap them with a cheap gauze.
customer_reviews.author: City Couple

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Cold Pack
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, yet comfortable and flexible material. I’m the type of person who wishes every day that people made things as well as they did in my grandfather’s days, and this product fits that bill. I’ve owned a few different cold packs in the past, but I’ll be sticking with this brand for a while. I bought 2 different sizes and already want to buy the other ones. I’d say it keeps its cold for around 1.5 - 2 hours on average, but did fall asleep with it on once and woke up 4 hours later with it still pretty cold.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton and Staci Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this for food, Amazon won't refund
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't rate so low if it were sold as strictly a therapeutic item. It doesn't get very cold and it does stay flexible so I would say it would be great if you're looking to treat a strained muscle. However when I searched for ice packs to cool food this came up and so I bought it for that purpose. And for that purpose, it is lousy. Not only that but Amazon will not take it as a return. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: magic mike

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to review this product because several reviewers have noted that "IT" does not stay cold. I did not find this the case at all, in fact just the opposite! Right out of the freezer I typically have to use a towel as the pad is just TOO cold for comfort! High quality construction and I expect to have this item for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stick60

customer_reviews.title: I’d give this 100 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this pack. This thing is a lifesaver, especially for my back...it covers the whole area from the base of my necks and down to my lower back area. Does not freez rock solid but is rather a gel pack that is very comfortable and cold. I would definitely buy again and again but this thing is so well constructed that I may not need to. You will not be disappointed in it. This is probably in the top 3 of products I have ever purchased...ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely any gel inside
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any gel inside. So when you wrap it around your neck and lay down all the gel squishes out the ends and doesn't ice the cervical area. It easily needs double the amount of gel inside. To make matters worse, I couldn't return it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I love the pain relief this brings me. The only thing I hate about this is how much perspiration it gets. This leaves puddles everywhere it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Flexible while frozen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice size. Even after being in my freezer flat for several hours or more, I had no problem putting it on my shoulder and having it bend over it in half. Yes, it was still bendable while frozen. My therapist recommended 20 minutes on / 20 minutes off / 20 minutes on and it stayed sufficiently cold.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hustead

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: With my back problems I have sciatic nerve problems in my leg. Sometimes when I walk too much it starts to really throb, this bad is huge but yet it’s flexible. Being flexible it rolls up and fits into my freezer nicely and when I need it, I can unroll it and lay it on my bad, put a towel down and lay on it long ways for pain relief. I 100% love this thing and I am so happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: good size fair price durable
customer_reviews.text: So I honestly bought this product to try for localized application to try and reduce body fat on my midsection (the internet tells you all sorts of things). Have not used it long enough to comment on that, but I can say its a strong durable product, can be folded up to fit into a small freezer, and covers a pretty large body area! I'm sure it would be great for back pain uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made but not super cold like I like
customer_reviews.text: I have several of the comfort gel packs (blue gel, clear plastic) and thought I would give this brand and design a try. I think this one holds the cold a little longer, but I don't feel it's as cold as the blue gel packs. The material is very durable, and I am not worried it's going to burst like some other brands. Personally, though, I prefer the other style just because I like the intense cold and a little more flex in the product. But this product is a good buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Coolsaya

customer_reviews.title: Great ice pack for sitting at a chair for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very good to use for working home these days. I paired it with another cushion for the added effects. I’ve also shared this great tips with others. All seem very happy. I also get some bruises on my leg and they help as well. I also tested it by throwing it in the freezer over night. It didn’t freeze up. Very nicely made!
customer_reviews.author: T L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Icepack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to primarily ice the area around my ankle. Seems durable and cools well, my only complaint is that it is not quite as flexible as I had hoped. It's flexible at warmer temps (maybe 5-10 min after removing from freezer), but still not great for my particular use. If I could go back ,I'd spend the time/money obtaining a more flexible ice pack, but that's just me and my particular case. I would have also gone with the larger size, but this is still better than my previous ice pack and does the job well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Packs I Own
customer_reviews.text: I use these after I run on my knees but they mold and fold to fit almost any body part. I've used them on my feet when I have had plantar fascitis, have used them on my hips and knees when I have IT band issues, and have used them on my neck and shoulders and lower back. They fit anywhere and stay cold much longer than you would expect. Really great product. I'm glad I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: nebbyKnezzar

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT buy again
customer_reviews.text: I just had a total shoulder replacement and purchased these before my surgery on June 30th; I am regretting that decision because, after two weeks of use, I missed the window to return. The set I received take forever to re-chill after use, they don't stay cold for longer than 10 minutes, and while they are flexible they really don't hold the shape needed to stay connected and provide relief.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger size cold pack for my knee, and this is perfect It also holds the cold longer than the ones you can buy in the store. I don't know why one of the rating choices was 'warm' , so I had to give that a low rating, as it really is cold. I will likely buy the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband as birthday gift and he said it did not stay along the shoulder area like it should and I was shocked to find out it was not returning so I will not be buying another item like this from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for broader injuries/surgeries
customer_reviews.text: My wife had to go through hip surgery and needed something that covered the surgical site and stayed cool for a good length of time. We liked this so much that we ended up getting a second one to keep in rotation in the freezer. The material allows for the item to be flexible enough to be wrapped around or folded over.
customer_reviews.author: surrealfrog

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For Me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help relieve the pain from tendonitis in my heel. Cold has always been my preferred method of pain relief but my usual ice packs are too stiff to bend around my heel. This pack works very well & gives me some relief when I've aggravated it. I just wish I'd bought one that had a strap on it so I could secure the pack around my heel & ankle. But I can see this being very useful for my husband & I for various aches & pains.
customer_reviews.author: PMW

customer_reviews.title: Quality Long Lasting Relief
customer_reviews.text: We use these a lot to cool down sprains or insect bites. You can also put one on the neck or head during the summer months, they offer a quick remedy. We always make sure to have some in the freezer. We have used some others before finding these. These FlexiKold Gel packs do have a longer cooling life as well as a longer lifetime over all. They are a quality product. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Howie

customer_reviews.title: High quality craftmanship and stays cold
customer_reviews.text: When you pick this up you can feel the quality and craftmanship put into this. Sometimes you buy a ice pack and you just know it's not going to last. Not this rime, I would not be surprised if this is around for the next ten plus years! It gets cold and you can still wrap around your leg or you can lay on it for your back and it doesn't feel like your laying on jagged pieces of ice. Stays cold for about an hour give or take.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wright

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay cold very long
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly big and bulky ice pad. It’s bulky enough that you would expect that it would stay cold a long time. Unfortunately, that’s not the case. I used the pack on a knee following a replacement surgery and it stayed cold maybe 45 minutes, far shorter than any other ice pad I tried. It was really disappointing. The pros for the pad are that it’s easy to mold to the part of body you’re using it for and it’s incredibly durable.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hard/solid when frozen
customer_reviews.text: I love that this thing remains flexible even after being in the freezer longer than the recommended amount of time. I use this for back pain, sprains, bug bites, basically anywhere I need a cold compress, and it easily molds to the curves in your body to provide as much of that sweet icy pain relief as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vocal booth and saving on air conditioning
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of voice over recording and it gets pretty brutal and hot during the summer. I can’t turn on any fans or the air conditioner because the microphone will pick up the noise. So I bring this giant ice pack with me and it keeps me cool for about an hour. Very well made, and doesn’t look like it’ll be leaking any time soon. Thinking about getting the neck one too! And of course it’ll come in handy in case I ever get injured too. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jenny W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: High quality product, very well made, thick nylon exterior, double-sealed seams
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! As a Senior citizen I have a lot of aches and pains due to arthritis.In the past I purchased inexpensive flexi-cold packs which sometimes leaked. This neck contour cold pack has a thick nylon exterior which is double-sealed, can be folded in the freezer, is pliable when frozen, and won't crack. It gets frozen after 90 minutes and remains cold for @ 25 minutes. Btw, I recently purchased 2 additional items from this company to address lower back pain - 1 for me & 1 as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Coady

customer_reviews.title: Great durable reusable ice pack for the neck and shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: Really love this neck ice pack. Have chronic neck pain and every time I get headaches it’s almost impossible for them to go away without taking Tylenol. Well this pack relaxed the muscles and really alleviates my neck pain and headaches. I’m thinking of getting this for the lower back size they have too. The one for the neck is perfectly shaped to cover your neck and shoulders. Gets cold fast and stays cold fast. I’ve kept it in a plastic bag in the freezer and it’s been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Lovepeace

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for a week now and it is a good size to use on knee which is what I purchased it for. I do feel that there could be a little more gel filling as sometimes it may all move to one side. I make sure to lay it a flat as possible in the freezer but it softens up quickly when removed. A useful product to keep on hand in case of sudden need also.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleSolutions

customer_reviews.title: Very good ice pad
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses a lot of ice packs as nurse and this one is very good. It is surprising cheap and very well made. We laughed because the sizes are huge! we got a smaller one it is good enough for us. Could it stay colder longer? sure but what one doesn't. It is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Travis Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great large cold pack
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this ice pack!!! Used it post knee surgery and the size with flexibility made it very easy to wrap around my knee. Stays cold for about 20 min and will freeze again within about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: skye2sea

customer_reviews.title: Leaky fabric
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to have gone down hill. This is the second one we purchased I feel like it has gone down in material we are having a lot of condensation. Looks like it has leaked it hasn't been even 2 weeks. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have had 2 neck surgeries and facet joint issues for the last 10 years so ice packs are part of my daily routine...I've tried most types out there. Flexi kold has a great durable outer shell that comfortable and super easy to clean...I dont forsee any gel leaks like cheaper brands. Has great flexibility molding around my neck straight out of the freezer BUT I do wish they stayed colder a bit longer like the packs with clay in them. I have a dedicated mini freezer to hold my ice packs and keeping the temp at max cold freezes Flexi kold enough to last about 45 min.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: a must have for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 4 of these they are amazing i keep one in every freezer. I wish I had these when I played sports. This is a must have in everyone's freezer
customer_reviews.author: Ryan bergami

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, stays cold, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with this purchase! I use these packs every day and love them. I suffer from migraines, but recently tore my rotator cuff again. Even though they’ll be in my freezer for 8 hours they are completely flexible! That’s the best part! I’m able to fold them or ‘mold’ them to fit right under my neck, shoulder, or knee! Best ice packs at a great price. I’m definitely buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Gel Ice pack ever
customer_reviews.text: I had foot surgery on my bunion before Thanksgiving last month and I needed a large gel gentle ice pack for my foot, and I am very happy with the ice pack. It stays cold for hours and hours and it's very comfortable, soft, and it doesn't get hard at all. I was so happy with it I purchased 2 more gel packs.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for post surgical pain!
customer_reviews.text: My mom had bought two of these prior to having her knee replaced and then gifted me one when I had a laparoscopy. We both adore ours! They’re easily foldable when cold and a durable fabric material. They stay cold for a very long time, mold to your body very nicely, and are pretty large (enough to cover my whole abdomen)! I definitely would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nemmer

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cold pack! The size is great because it covers all of my lower back and because it's flexible I can fold it in half to keep it in the freezer. Also, because it is flexible, I can sit in a chair and support the pack against a pillow or I can be lazy, and lay down on it while on the sofa. When using it this way I do put a towel around it. It takes up very little room in my freezer so I keep it in there all the time. When using it, it stays cold for a good 20 minutes. I definitely recommend it and think it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Nana

customer_reviews.title: Works well for applying cold pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but would suggest straps on both ends to help with adjusting. Many of us do not have someone who can put the pack on if we are laying down. Having straps would facilitate the adjustment. It would also help if using it in a sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: SKF

customer_reviews.title: Better than the cold pack from my PT
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled after I suffered a severe leg injury a few years ago I purchased a large gel pack from my physical therapist that I loved. Regrettably, I loaned it to a family member who lost it :(. This pack is actually a little better than the one I got from my therapist. I’m thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big
customer_reviews.text: This cold pack is a great size for my lower spine. Other packs are a bit too small. It lays flat and takes very little vertical space in the freezer. Solidly made. Good choice
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: FlexiKold Neck Cold Pack Made My Neck Feel Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from horrible neck pain at the base of my neck for years. I used the FlexiKold Neck Cold Pack after using heat and massage on my neck and the combination had an amazing pain reducing effect. It made my neck feel great and increased blood circulation in the affected area. I also had increased flexibility and mobility afterwards. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great for knees
customer_reviews.text: I have one replaced knee and the other one is past due to be replaced. This product is absolutely perfect for my bad knee. I’m on my feet 10 + hours a day and I need to ice my knee down every day. This product covers my WHOLE knee and brings the swelling down. I love it and it has made my sleepless nights go away! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Davidowicz

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I've paid are cold enough and large enough to cover a knee hip or back. The old ice packs I use were filled with gel which sloshed around the park providing uneven cooling. These Flexgold paks are filled with a more solid substance that does not do that and provides more even icing. They are also relatively light weight which puts less pressure on the post surgical or sound site.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Super cold!
customer_reviews.text: Neck/shoulders they are a bit thinner than I would have liked but the quality of the materials and the construction are extremely high. We are very pleased and intend to buy other sizes. These packs get VERY cold in our freezer,far colder than any other freezer or ice packs we have ever tried! So impressed!
customer_reviews.author: limpinlou

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large pack to help with a knee injury. Works great! Love the fact that I can wrap the pack around my knee! Stays colder longer than other Ice packs I have purchased at pharmacies. Very good product for a great price. Other reviews I read about this item stated that the product does not stay cold, I did not find this to be true at all. I wrapped the pack in a white t-shirt so it did not have direct contact with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: marissa coccia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold very long
customer_reviews.text: After keeping this in the freezer for more than 24 hours one would expect an ice-pack that stays cold for at least an hour. Not so with this pack. While it it initially very cold- use a towel- it quickly warms up and within 10-15 minutes it loses most of its coldness. I found that using cheap plastic bags filled with ice worked better than this pack. It does wrap around the leg easily however.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Advocate NC

customer_reviews.title: At last
customer_reviews.text: Although not really used as ice pack.. my gf has heat flashes so i thought maybe this would help and the oversized one was prefect for her to lay on...well it came today and she said its cool as is so no need to freeze and as i type this she lays still sleeping like a baby...so , so far its a win....we shall see and i will up date as time goes on....but thank you for a nights rest for BOTH of us!!!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I have carpel tunnel in both hands. I have dont surgery for one but one is still waiting to be fixed. If anyone knows the pain they know that cold therapy helps Immensely. This pro it works to fold hamburger style around my hand and place second hand on top for dual comfort. It’s also long enough to lay flat and help ease pain from wrist to fingers. I feel it only stays cold for 20 minutes and wish it was longer but I do like the product and material.
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and soft
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a tooth extracted and the recovery was very painful for two weeks. I bought three of these ice packs to rotate with to manage my swelling. They were a huge help! I slept with one behind my neck and kept one by my ear when I was sitting up. It has helped sore muscles in my back as well. I did not know you could have a favorite ice pack but this one is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Little

customer_reviews.title: Offers Instant Relief for Swelling After Surgery
customer_reviews.text: This cold therapy product was recommended by my Physical Therapist to provide relief after surgery. These large Gel Filled ice pack offers instant relief for my knee to assist in reducing swelling following my knee replacement surgery. It is large enough to cover the entire knee and stays cool over 20 minutes. The weight is enough to hold in place and not uncomfortable on my sensitive area.
customer_reviews.author: Ricks Farm Art and Sawmilling

customer_reviews.title: Easy to freeze and works great
customer_reviews.text: These freeze fairly quickly and make icing an injury fairly easy. I got the small and medium size and while the small fits most of the injured area, I end up using the medium one more often since it covers side area which I feel is beneficial. Would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a good ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Standard size is just right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the standard size to use for my lower back. It is just the right size, targeting the area I need it in without being too big to manage well. It also fits well in the freezer. I wrap it with a lightweight towel and it is still notably cold for the 15 to 20 minute period I use it for. It is comfortable to lay on when I’m on the couch or on the bed. Very happy I bought it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debrah Krogman

customer_reviews.title: Life savers!
customer_reviews.text: These cold packs have been a lifesaver for me! I had knee replacement surgery 20 days ago. After a couple days at homes realized I needed really cold and really big chilling to reduce swelling and relieve my pain. 2 of the standard/ regular packs really did the trick They do get very cold and stiff, but as they warm somewhat, they contour around the area and seal in the cool. With two, you can rotate them. Believe me ice bags and frozen peas have nothing on these for lasting cool or durability. Money well spent, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Book Babe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it’s big enough to stay put. It’s smooth feeling & really helps with the swelling on my ankles & knee
customer_reviews.author: Penny Raposo

product_meta.title: FlexiKold Gel Ice Pack (Standard Large: 10.5" x 14.5") - Reusable Ice Pack for Injuries (Cold Pack Compress to aid Back Injuries, Pain Relief for Shoulder, Ankle, Neck, Hip, Elbow, Wrist) - 6300-COLD
feature_bullets: COLDER FOR LONGER: Reusable ice packs for injuries with proprietary gel interior that stays Colder for Longer than competing cold packs using inferior bentonite formulations.

MORE FLEXIBLE: The Most Flexible Cold Pack available due to the best professional-grade gel interior that remains pliable when frozen. Large Ice pack for knees, back, shoulders, hip, neck or anywhere injuries occur.

HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL'S CHOICE: The large ice pack used by thousands of Physical Therapists and other medical, healthcare professionals to aid acute and chronic pain relief, muscle pain, arthritis, inflammation, swelling, menopause-related hot flashes, headaches, and injury recovery.
PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION: Each gel cold pack compress is built with double-sealed seams to prevent leaking; with extra thick nylon exterior. Washable and reusable cold therapy ice bags at its best.
FAST PAIN RELIEF: for anywhere you need a cold pack compress: shoulders, hip, elbows, neck, legs, hands or feet. Try our reusable gel ice packs for knees, back injuries, or to aid any recovery.
